name: Comets!
description:
That's right folks!  It's time for a clone of an old game to be made.  This time its asteroids!  You've all played Asteroids before, you know how it goes.  But this time it might play a little different than before.

Your objective, survive for as long as you can, all while taking out as many Comets as you can.  But watch out for your fuel, if you're not careful you may run out.  Luckily someone stashed extra-large cans of gas in the cores or the comets so be on the lookout.  Move with W, steer with left and right, shoot with space and brake with shift.  By using all of your skills to their full potential you can gain a new highscore!
